netCDF¶

geoville_storage_gate.netCDF.convert_geotiff_to_netcdf(gtiff_path, ncdf_path)¶

Converts a GeoTiff file to a netcdf file

Parameters

  • gtiff_path – geotiff path incl. file name

  • ncdf_path – path to the output netcdf file

geoville_storage_gate.netCDF.delete_netcdf(ncdf_path)¶

This function deletes a netcdf file

Parameters

ncdf_path – Path incl. file name of the netCDF file that will be deleted

geoville_storage_gate.netCDF.get_group_names(ncdf_path)¶

Returns a list with all the group names within a netcdf file

Parameters

ncdf_path – path to a netcdf file

Returns

list with all group names within the netcdf file

geoville_storage_gate.netCDF.merge_netcdf_to_data_cube(ncdf_paths, ncdf_data_cube)¶

This function merges several netcdf files of the same information and spatial extent. The only difference is the timestamp.

Parameters

  • ncdf_paths – list of paths to .nc files

  • ncdf_data_cube – path to the .nc file that will contain the merge
